What we do:

  We provide free, stable and secure wifi so you can focus on getting your work done, catching up with news, or just chatting to friends and family. Because you shouldn't have to care about the network.

Why we do it:

 We are sick of having to pay for wifi when we're on the move and wanted to develop a service that would just work.

How much does it cost:

 It's all free! We make our money based on agreements with ISPs, no advertising, no privacy invasion, just solid free and secure wifi.
